==Bulletin Board==
{{Dialogue start}}
:'''Notice of Shamshir's Smithy:''' Under the latest regulations of the Akademiya, orders of pattern-welded steel weapons in large quantities must first be reported to the Citadel of Regzar and approved.
:'''Notice of Shamshir's Smithy:''' We have temporarily stopped accepting private orders not listed in the Teyvat Catalogue of Common Weapons, especially private orders for automatic devices.
:'''Notice of Shamshir's Smithy:''' If you have a special request, please provide supporting documents from the relevant school.
{{Dialogue end}}

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
{{Lang|''{{w|Shamshir}}''|fa=شمشیر}} is a type of Persian/Iranian sword with a radical curve. The name is derived from the Persian word shamshīr, which means "sword".
